caption: A group of people gathered around a massive creature. One man held a walkie-talkie, wore sunglasses and a hat. He enthusiastically explained things to the others and gave a thumbs-up. Someone was filming this scene. The man with the hat approached an elderly man and a girl, draping scarves around their necks. A photographer took pictures while the man signed the scarves for the two. The elderly man and the girl walked into the woods. The old man started working in the forest. He showed something to the girl. She held it in her hands. The girl joined the old man, and there were several tombstones in the area. She hurriedly ran through the forest.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, ancient age, modern age or future?(Does the technology exists on earth?)

what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
Where does the video take place? Indoors or outdoors?
